title: A Point of return
creator_credit: International Film Bureau and Carl Stevenson
brief_description: Presents the problem of suicide as discussed by doctors, psychiatrists, and social workers. Uses a case history to point out that the causes and related aspects of suicide are not always understood. Includes an introduction by Dr Karl Menninger.
